current.type_orther_family: Baskerville, 'Baskerville Old Face', 'Hoefler Text', Garamond, 'Times New Roman', serif
current.about_about_text_1: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
current.about_about_text_2:
Wolverine Creative is an award winning digital media, web design and PR agency. In 2012, Wolverine Creative was recognized as one of the top 3 Advertising Agencies in Wisconsin by readers of Corporate Report Wisconsin. The company recently received two gold Hermes Awards for design and five Alchemy Awards from the Public Relations Society of America, more than any other agency in Madison, Wisconsin.

Wolverine Creative was also a 2006 Wisconsin Better Business Bureau Business Ethics Torch award finalist and has been recognized twice by Madison Magazine as one of the best places to work in Dane County.
current.about_services_text: Wolverine Creative are an independent , one-stop creative specialist with the experience & the know how to come up with great business solutions and make them happen
current.about_team_text: Most businesses think that product is the most important thing, but without great leadership, mission and a team that deliver results at a high level, even the best product won't make a company successful.
current.about_pricetable_text: Design is our art and our passion. Our goal is to create the best products with a pixel-perfect eye for detail and a high standard for aesthetic excellence. Let us help you make your website simple, beautiful and professional.
current.home5_who_we_are_text: Wolverine Creative are an independent , one-stop creative specialist with the experience & the know how to come up with great business solutions and make them happen
